item.title: Need help with ("sit")
item.dc:creator: @Robban1 Robban1
item.description:
@Robban1 wrote:

there is like a afk comamnd. if this is your command: if (command.startsWith("sit") && playerRights >= 1) {So must you put a emote thing. so it be like this:(idk if it is right) you must just only change the “start animation” number to the emote number as “sit” Is. (as do so you sit)

[code]if (command.startsWith(“sit”))
{
startAnimation(1353);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

txt4 = “I’m Sitting Here!!!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

        ^^^^^^^^^  This is what you should add just change start animation from 1353(the 1353 emote number is you sitting on a chair if it is that you are wanting.If you want to sit on a chair dont change.)
